Package jpa.entities

Class RefreshToken

java.lang.Object
jpa.entities.BaseEntity
jpa.entities.RefreshToken
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class RefreshToken extends BaseEntity
Persisted refresh token entry used for rotation and revocation.
